DESCRIPTION: Shows the remaining time for the next episode of a particular anime. Returns to this day's schedule if no anime is specified.
EXAMPLE: nextairing | nextair boruto | nextep black clover | nextepisode attack on titan | pep tensura
APEP_DESC4: Please try again in a few minutes. This is usually caused by server downtime.
APEP_DESC5: **{{member}}**, This anime may have already **finished airing**,
APEP_DESC6: has the **next ep date unknown**, or that anime may **never existed**!
APEP_DESC15:
The date of the next episode is currently **unknown**..
​
APEP_DESC17:
No Anime was found for the next 7 days.
​
